code: import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import{logoutRoute}from"../utils/APIRoutes";import"./Logout.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Logout(){const navigate=useNavigate();const handleClick=async()=>{let id;if(localStorage.getItem("secret-key")!=null){id=await JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("secret-key"))._id;}else if(localStorage.getItem("secret-key-admin")!=null){id=await JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("secret-key-admin"))._id;}const data=await axios.get("".concat(logoutRoute,"/").concat(id));if(data.status===200){localStorage.clear();navigate("/login");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"styled-logout-button",onClick:handleClick,children:"Logout"});}
